author: Chelsea Ritschel, Chelsea Ritschel
title: Coronavirus: How volunteers in America are helping in the fight against Covid-19
description: People are using hashtag #MakeMedicalMasks to share sewing patterns for volunteers
content:
Americans are stepping up to do what they can to fight the virus and help those on the front lines.
While the majority of US citizens have been engaging in social distancing practises in an effort to curb the spread of coronavirus, many others are finding di… [+4106 chars]
